title: Home Office seeks to appeal court ruling on Epping asylum hotel
summary: The High Court refused a last-minute request by the Home Office to intervene in the Epping asylum hotel case.

title: Dozens arrested and weapons seized ahead of Notting Hill Carnival
summary: Some 100 people have been arrested and 11 guns seized ahead of Notting Hill Carnival, police say.

title: Noel Clarke loses libel case against the Guardian over sexual misconduct allegations
summary: The award-winning actor sued the newspaper's publisher for printing allegations of sexual misconduct.

title: Proposed Ukraine land concessions are Putin's trap, EU's top diplomat tells BBC
summary: Kaja Kallas' warning comes as Donald Trump sets a two-week period to assess peace talks between Moscow and Kyiv.

title: Meet the England players chasing glory at Women's Rugby World Cup
summary: England's 32-player squad for a home Women's Rugby World Cup contains experience and star quality.
